title: Sexiest Super Bowl matchups
itunes:title: Sexiest Super Bowl matchups
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – discuss all the latest news from around the NFL including the Jaguars promoting Doug Marrone to head coach, and an update on Jordy Nelson’s status as the Packers prepare for a huge matchup against the Cowboys in the Divisional round of the playoffs. Then, the heroes debate which potential Super Bowl matchup they think is the sexiest before diving into some listener questions from the old ATN Mailbag.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
